CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: After cooling the substrate , a solution of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM ( or PC 70 BM ) mixture ( 1 : 2 w / w ) was spin - coated , where a blend of chloroform and o-dichlorobenzene ( 4 : 1 v / v ) was used as the solvent.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM (or PC 70 BM) |
| chloroform |
| o-dichlorobenzene |

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. They are involved in the process of creating a thin film on a substrate.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM (or PC 70 BM) |
| chloroform |
| o-dichlorobenzene |

I have removed the phrase "the substrate" as it does not clearly refer to a material name. The other entities are materials used in the process of creating a thin film.
